articles.title: Neanderthal Legacy: Unraveling the Genetic Threads of “Viking Disease” - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Many men in northern Europe over the age of 60 suffer from the so-called Viking disease, which means that the fingers lock in a bent position. Now researchers at Karolinska Institutet, together with colleagues, have used data from over 7,000 affected individu…
articles.content: An illustration of a Neanderthal and a sketch of ring finger locked in a bent position as seen in Dupuytrens disease, colloquially known as the Viking disease. New research finds that the genetic ori… [+3356 chars]

articles.author: Sanjay Dutta
articles.title: IEA: 80% Russian oil exports went to India, China in May - Times of India
articles.description: India News: India and China guzzled almost 80% of Russian crude exports in May as the global oil flow changed direction under G7 and European energy curbs on Mosc
